After an accident at the Twin X research facility, the sky
has been changed to be like a mirror, and all electronics no
longer work. There are also children born after this event
who have mystical powers to change the environment around
them. The story centers on a brother and sister, Tatsuya and
Kiyoko, the children of a scientist at the Twin X facility.

The source for this had really bad lag for the japanese audio and subtitles, the subs were about 50-60 miliseconds ahead of the actual audio so I edited the subs and made them sync up better. Otherwise it is untouched as in video wise. I also increased the volume for speech a bit as some parts were way to low to hear or the FX shadowed the speech. Increased speech volume by 30% over sound-efects. Original source creds go to sandman1. Seed and Enjoy!
